resources.string: One or more required permission are missing. Please grant access to all permissions from App Settings.
Camera Not Found.Please allow camera permission in App Settings.
Camera permission needed. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Location permission needed. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Contact Read permission needed. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Read permission needed. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Write permission needed. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.
Please grant phone permission to proceed further.
